entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of light snow this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
